archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0875
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst, I want be able to access customer and related provisioned service information from our Network, Rating and Billing systems so that can reconcile the customers we have provisioned within our network to the customers we have provisioned within our rating and billing platforms and identify any mismatch

properties.value: Looks like a need to export service information? Kiri: Correct, plus access to systems for the team

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
